name: Arrow
desc: Basic arrows of standard construction.

name: Bolt
desc: Basic bolts of standard construction. Used with crossbows.

name: Stone
desc: Basic stone used by slings.

name: Stone of Fire
desc: Stone used by slings. These stones add fire damage.

name: Blue Scale Leather
desc: This armour is blue and silver wrought like fish's scales, and yet pliable and light as standard leather.

name: Chainmail Armor
desc: Armor set made of chainmail

name: Ivory Plate Mail
desc: An exquisite suit of armour fashioned from ivory plates. Despite being buried within these caves for so long, it sill gleams pure white, likely due to its magical properties.

name: Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather

name: Platemail Armor
desc: Armor set made of solid metal plates

name: Robes
desc: Armor set made of cloth

name: Silver Chainmail
desc: This mail linked together shines silver, and can withstand more punishment than standard issue chainmail.

name: Studded Leather Armor
desc: The brown set of worked leather is reinforced with metal studs, making it more durable.

name: Studded Leather Armor
desc: The brown set of worked leather is reinforced with metal studs, making it more durable.

name: Wyvern Hide
desc: This is the hide from a freshly killed wyvern.

name: Lanterna History
desc: This is a complete History of Lanterna. You are very familiar with this book since you have studied it in school. Here are the main events...

name: Emerald
desc: Emerald Gem

name: Golden Goblet
desc: Golden Goblet

name: Gold Ring
desc: Ring made of solid gold

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
desc: Ring made of solid gold that grants a 30% resistance to fire.

name: Ring of Protection
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by one point.

name: Camping Kit
desc: Allows the party to rest until fully recovered.

name: Alabaster Statue
desc: A pure white statuette of a woman. Carved with exquisite detail, it somehow seems vivid, full of life. The staff held perpendicular to the fugure is a sign of warding and guardianship.

name: Ancient Urn
desc: An antique vessel of unknown origin, filled with ashes.

name: Apple of Wisdom
desc: A bite from this supposedly forbidden fruit will increase one's wisdom (INT +2 permanently).

name: Bacon-wrapped Chicken
desc: This tasty, succulent prepared meat will be mouthwatering when heated over an open fire.

name: Black Feathers
desc: These are the feathers plucked from a murder of Storm Crows. They are glossy black and have the odd sensation of static electricty.

name: Boots of Might
desc: Boots made of sturdy leather. Laced with enchantment, when worn, they will augment a person's strength.

name: Circlet of Intellect
desc: A light crown, rather than designating royalty, is highly prized among Mages.

name: Coiled Rope
desc: This is a coil of 50' rope.

name: Common Shovel
desc: This is a common shovel, or spade, designed primarily for the purpose of digging or remvoing earth and spreading the soil. It would also probably be effective to whack someone in the head.

name: Cryptic Message
desc: This scroll is written with strange characters that you are unable to decipher. However, one name appears to stand out in common letters, ASHERIM, repeated throughout the message.

name: Diamond
desc: This rare diamond is a gem of alluring beauty. It can be fixed to a headpiece and worn as a shining star that dazzles those who look upon the wearer.

name: Dragon Steak Tartar
desc: This meat dish gets its name from its tough exterior, although inside is finely cut and tender, minced with spice and onions.

name: Eshe's Rose
desc: This is a scented rose given to you by the flower girl of Khyn.

name: Genie Lamp
desc: A brass antique oil lamp, looking remarkably polished, which suggests it might somehow be magical. Perhaps it is one of those legendary artifacts if you rub the side, a genie will appear to grant wishes.

name: Grappling Hook
desc: A metal hook with three prongs, that can be attached to a length of rope.

name: Lady Abigail's Poem
desc: A piece of yellowed parchment with elegant hand wrting done in black ink. These verses are expressive, tumbling down the page with emotion.

name: Lucky Rabbit's Foot
desc: +1 Charisma

name: Musical Instruments
desc: A collection of harps and flutes, and other assorted musical items including tambourines and a lute.

name: Parchment
desc: Seek opportunity with Sly

name: Potion of Fortitude
desc: This vessel contains a potent Troll mixture, creatures known for their legendary powers of regeneration (STR +2 permanently).

name: Ring of Agility
desc: This pure golden ring will grant the wearer enhanced dexterity.

name: Ring of Protection
desc: A silver ring that seems to grant the wearer some minimal protection, such as avoiding hits or redirecting contact to mere grazes.

name: Sizzling Swine Soup
desc: This hot bowl of soup contains a thick broth mixed with pork and vegetables.

name: Torch
desc: This is a torch that comes with flint and and tinderbox.

name: Wagon Wheel
desc: This is a standard wheel for a mid-sized wagon or cart. The iron rim has been hammered into a perfect circle. It looks sturdy enough to handle rugged terrain.

name: Wild Berries
desc: These vibrant red berries are as large as a marble, and can fit in the palm of a child's hand. It is not certain if they are poisonous or not, growing in the wild.

name: Extra Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of moderate wounds (+16 hp)

name: Goblin Beer
desc: A thick green frothy beverage.

name: Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of minor wounds (+8 HP)

name: Mystic Brew
desc: A clear sparkling liquid, fizzy and with a sweet aroma.

name: Spell Points Potion
desc: user regains some spell points (+20 SP)

name: Iron Shield
desc: A round piece of iron to block attacks

name: Large Shield
desc: shield made of metal

name: Shield of the Sun
desc: A magnificent heavy shield with the image of the sun emblazoned upon an azure field. This item radiates a protective warmth.

name: Magic Amulet
desc: A test item for testing Conversations starting from item use

name: Magic Book
desc: A test item for testing Encounters starting from item use...this item is set to be destroyed after use.

name: Battle Axe
desc: Battle axe of standard construction

name: Crossbow
desc: crossbow made of common materials

name: Dagger
desc: small blade

name: Diamond Long Sword
desc: This sword has a jewel encrusted hilt and a keen blade.

name: Elvish Short Sword +1
desc: This magic weapon has a +1 enhancement bonus to attack and damage. It was forged and enchanted by the Western Elves during the early years of the world. It is known to give courage to those who wield the sword.

name: Fine Longbow
desc: This is an exquisite longbow, fashioned out of high quality material with a string like a thread of silver.

name: Fire Dagger
desc: dagger of standard construction that also causes an additional 1-2 point(s) of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Flail
desc: A mutli-headed blunt instrument, each striking head attached to the wooden handle by a chain.

name: Flaming Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction that also causes an additional 2-3 points of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Hand Axe
desc: Hand axe of standard construction

name: Long Bow
desc: long bow constructed of common materials

name: Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction

name: Mace
desc: Mace of standard construction

name: Short Bow
desc: short bow made of common materials

name: Short Sword
desc: a short sword constructed of standard but sound materials

name: Sling
desc: small sling made of common materials

name: Sling of Fire
desc: small sling made of common materials that adds 1 point of fire damage.

name: Spear
desc: Spear of standard construction

name: Steel Broad Sword
desc: This wide blade is forged of a strange steel with traces of cobalt. It seems to have some minor enchantment.

name: The Watchman's Torch
desc: This short sword is of Dwarven make, the blade marked with firey red runes that give off a faint sensation of heat. The clan Faxcrest was also known as the House of the Torch.

name: Troll Hammer
desc: This heavy hammer has a head made of stone, and takes enormous strength to wield it with two hands.

name: Winkie's Short Bow
desc: Winkie was a famed adventurer and treasure hunter who took on a host of monsters armed only with a short bow. His remains must have been buried here long ago, as the markings along this bow are made with enchanted runes identifying this ranged weapon as his.
